title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.80 - Porter service charge and limit of liability per parcel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.80 - Porter service charge and limit of liability per parcel

State Regulations

The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey will
furnish porter service to the public at the Port Authority bus terminal, the
charge for this service to be 25 cents per parcel carried by a porter and the
liability of the Port Authority to be limited to $25 per
parcel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.80

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
